portrait_left.title: Artistry in Every Stitch
portrait_left.caption: From the initial sketch to the final steam, our artisans pour their heart into every garment. SRISHA represents not just fashion, but a legacy of meticulous craftsmanship.

three_grid.title: The Collection
three_grid.caption: Explore silhouettes that define modern grace.

portrait_right.title: Modern Heritage
portrait_right.caption: We bridge the gap between traditional Indian aesthetics and contemporary global trends. Our designs are strictly limited edition, ensuring exclusivity for our patrons.
